#summary three steps to get started

=Pre-requisites=

  * Java :)
  * Maven 2
  * MySQL

Create two empty schemas in MySQL DB:
  * simple_development
  * simple_test

= Download simple example app =

Getting started is easy, download this simple application:
[http://activeweb.googlecode.com/files/simple.zip Simlpe ActiveWeb Project]

= Code modifications =

Modify JDBC connection parameters in:
  * class `app.config.DbConfig`
  * jetty-env.xml
  * pom.xml

=Run the application=

{{{
mvn jetty:run
}}}

= Navigate with browser=

Hit this URL: [http://localhost:8080/simple-example/]
